genresAdvancedInfo.name: korean bl ost
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Korean BL OST refers to the original soundtracks of Korean BL (Boys' Love) dramas. These dramas feature romantic relationships between male characters and have gained popularity in recent years. The music is often emotional and melancholic, reflecting the struggles and conflicts faced by the characters. The OSTs are known for their beautiful melodies and powerful vocals, and have become a significant part of the Korean BL culture.
